## Matrix.Reflection() method

Computes a reflection matrix from a plane

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Reflection(plane: Plane): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  plane | <code>Plane</code> | defines the reflection plane |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

a new matrix
